events.name: BID TO BUILD
events.description: Win the parts. Wire the win.
events.fullDescription: Teams will be given a 'Mystery Circuit' problem statement. In Round 1, identify required components and bid for them using a fixed virtual budget. In Round 2, simulate the circuit using only components purchased.

rounds.name: Round 1: The Component Auction
rounds.description: Identify required components for a 'Mystery Circuit' and bid for them using a fixed virtual budget. Only teams that secure all necessary components within budget move to the next round. Wrong parts or bankrupt teams are eliminated.

rounds.name: Round 2: Simulation Showdown
rounds.description: Simulate the circuit using only the components purchased in Round 1. Software: Any standard tool allowed (Tinkercad, Proteus, LTspice, etc.). Goal: Demonstrate a fully functional output to the judges.

rules: Teams must bring one laptop with simulation software installed or use online software
Judging Criteria: 40% Auction Strategy (Budget saved + Inventory accuracy)

events.name: Sail The Circuit
events.description: Pirate-themed physical circuit adventure with team challenges.
events.fullDescription: Embark on a pirate-themed adventure through physical circuit challenges. Navigate through multiple rounds of hands-on electrical engineering tasks with a fun pirate twist. Form a team of 3 pirates and conquer the challenges!

rounds.name: The Smuggler's Path
rounds.description: Transfer pearls through tilted pipes/channels without dropping them.

rounds.name: Lullaby of the Deep
rounds.description: Navigate wire loop while music plays (freeze when silent).

rounds.name: The Stolen Beat
rounds.description: Fix a circuit using only hand signals (no speaking allowed).

rules: Time limits apply to each round
No verbal communication in final round
Top teams advance to next rounds

events.name: Electric Wordza
events.description: Team-based electrical word and clue solving challenge.
events.fullDescription: Electric Wordza is a team-based electrical knowledge game that tests your understanding of electrical concepts through word puzzles and interactive challenges. Form a team of 3 and showcase your electrical vocabulary!

rounds.name: Electric Bingo
rounds.description: Match electrical terms on a grid to complete bingo patterns.

rounds.name: Act & Guess
rounds.description: Enact electrical terms, teammates guess with maximum 3 clues.

rules: No external help or mobile devices allowed
Time limits apply to each round
Maximum 3 clues per term in Round 2

events.name: U(know)
events.description: Multi-round competition targeting first and second-year students.
events.fullDescription: A thrilling multi-round competition specifically designed for first and second-year students. First-year students get hints to level the playing field. Test your electrical knowledge through UNO, component identification, and circuit solving!

rounds.name: UNO Game
rounds.description: UNO game competition (top 5 from each group of 10 advance).

rounds.name: Component Identification
rounds.description: Identify electrical/electronic components from images (1 minute limit).

rules: Top performers advance to next rounds

events.name: Project Presentation
events.description: Showcase projects addressing UN Sustainable Development Goals.
events.fullDescription: Demonstrate your engineering prowess by presenting real-time working projects that address UN Sustainable Development Goals. Showcase innovative solutions, prototypes, and implementations with clear impact on global challenges.

rounds.name: Project Demo
rounds.description: Demonstrate your working project to judges and visitors.

rounds.name: Presentation & Q&A
rounds.description: Present your project concept, implementation, and SDG impact. Answer questions from judges.

rules: Team Size: Maximum of 3 members per team
Must address UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDG number clearly mentioned)
Evaluation based on innovation, technical depth, feasibility, sustainability, and impact

events.name: Battleship
events.description: Logic-based electrical battleship challenge with puzzles.
events.fullDescription: A strategic logic-based game combining the classic Battleship concept with electrical engineering challenges. Test your logical reasoning and electrical knowledge through puzzle-solving and board navigation.

rounds.name: Sink or Strike
rounds.description: Solve electrical puzzles to locate and sink hidden ships.

rounds.name: Pirates of the Power Grid
rounds.description: Navigate a board game with logic puzzles, traps, and power-ups (10 min max, dice-based movement).
